item.title: Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew
item.description:
Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew

Overview

  • We all are fascinated with various analytical outcomes like different kinds of visualization. But do we know that 50% of the time is just spent cleansing, understanding, & exploring your data? Also, it is a combustion process, multiple iterations, time-consuming, etc.?

  • AWS launched the Glue DataBrew service to focus more on the business use-case and simplify the preparation activities. This session will focus on the Introduction of the Databrew service, different functionality, followed by a quick demo
